reviews.review: Od czasu do czasu
Left 4 Dead es un juego cooperativo basado en ayuda para poder lograr las misiones, ademas de no dejar morir a tus compañeros y que no te dejen morir a ti.
The first is always better

One of the best zombie co-op games.
The atmosphere and characters are more serious compared to the second title.
Even though the second title has ported all the original content, but it still the first and the original title.
Regardless, both title are great though.

Aunque haya pasado tiempo, aún sigue siendo de los mejores juegos, y de los que entraron a lo cooperativo, así que buen juego. Aunque paso mucho tiempo, es de los mejores juego de la historia, siendo el comienzo de una corta saga (de dos juegos) que llevo a risas y frustraciones, gracias Left 4 Dead.
Мочить зобарей не надоедает, рекомендуеться играть с друзьями
Muito bom,um dos melhores jogos de zumbi que ja foi feito

Esse jogo merece aplausos de muitos!. Alem de ser um dos melhores jogos que ja joguei, ele é o que mais me chama atenção; O fato é que sua mecânica e jogabilidade são incríveis e divertidas! vai muito além de ser "Uma gameplay" o tempo gasto jogando esse game é surreal de impressionante!!! eu dou meus parabéns pela desenvolvedora, o game já está "velho" e ainda sim é jogado como novo. Além da outra obra-prima, Left 4 Dead 2! que é sem palavras. EU AINDA ESPERO POR LEFT 4 DEAD 3!!! que sem mais, será um dos jogos mais bem vistos de todos os tempos! Recomendo!
I'M RELOADING!

Me gusta todo en el juego, me gusta especialmente que hayan diferentes tipos de enemigos (zombies), y que tengan diferentes habilidades especiales, me gusta que el juego posee diferentes modos de juego que divierten en todo momento.
Lo recomiendo para jugadores que les guste la habilidad, los juegos con armas, los juegos de supervivencia y la exploración.
J.R.

Sadly the multiplayer is dying and of course theres the L4D2 (awesome too) but this game is still magnificent.
Love the chitchat between characters.

Pipebomb ticking....

ZOEY: Nice one, Francis. Maybe throw the bomb out the window next time.
FRANCIS: Zoey, you might not watch a lot baseball.... But it ain't good for a man's pitchin' arm when a zombie's hangin' off it by its goddamn teeth.
LOUIS: Damn it! Now they're all coming up here!
FRANCIS: Yeah, I know, Louis. Tell ya what, next time I'll throw it up your ass. Then you can just clench and.... Akh! Pffh! ...hate... zombies.. so much...

The best lines in game history.... :D
Would recommend.

Игра крутая, атмосферная. Радует наличие разных видов зомби, а не тупая толпа бегущая на тебя, они заставляют обдумывать свои шаги и учится распозновать их, едва заслышев. Фанатею по играм тематики зомби, особенно от тех, где можно играть кооперативом.
По скидке купите друзья и даже без скидок можно,клевая игра,можно играть вместе !
Динамичная веселая игра для совместного прохождения..

De lo poco que he jugado puedo decir que el juego esta bastante entretenido, en especial si juegas con otras 3 personas :u

Por mas años que pasen este juego sigue siendo el rey en modo cooperativo. Muy recomendable para jugar con otros 3 amigos, risas garantizadas.

I tried to nominate Left 4 Dead for all awards but the system is not ready for this kind of awesome level of this game. It is completely unfair.

You only need this game. Trust me.

L4D- отличная игра, для отличной компании людей. Первая часть не имеет лишних деталей и не уступает второй части по хардкорности. Игроки в этой игре разумные, общительные люди. Советую эту игру любителям коопа и веселья.
Если тебя всё достало на работе, ты хочешь "сорвать всех собак", то добро пожаловать в эту замечательную игру.
Best game ever better than unturned

感染爆发的那一段时间，我们，参与其中。



曾并不知这惊心动魄变化多端的异国灾难之旅是出自Valve之手，那时我对Valve的印象仅限于反恐精英（CS1.5）的片头中那左眼镶着阀门伴随着诡异音乐的男人。随后的游戏时光中才发现了L4D中木箱子的模型跟《半条命2》里的一模一样、火焰效果也是异曲同工之类的......
不论开头如何，我因此继续了这场冒险，伴随着武器的上膛开火，不计其数却又珍足的弹药被射入感染者的身体：“reloading！”不绝于耳......



渴望合作的伙伴们，你们有闲情逸趣的话，不妨来体验这场经典的灾难旅程。
top game )
Игра нормальная,затягивает если вы играете с друзьями, мне нравится серия Left 4 Dead)

Я очень доволен этой игрой и ни капли не пожалел, что купил её! И всем вам советую поиграть в неё вместе с друзьями!
Плюсы (основные) : 
- динамика игры просто бешенная.
- очень весело.
- много разных режимов игры.
- достаточное разнообразие карт.
Минусы ( главные ) :
- в этой части нет рукопашного боя.
- боты хоть и убивают врагов, но не помогают другим игрокам команды.
- иногда происходит сбив настроек боя ( уровень сложности выше или карта не та ).
Ну а в принципе игруха предназначена для игры с друзьями!!!

This is great game i would never get tired of it, after i have played lets say 50 games in the course of 6 months i get tired of every game i owned i will always come back to this game, because is just a classic for me. Would Never ever get tired of playing this game, love killing zombies and this game does an awesome job creating my dreams into a virtual game.
My rating for this game is 10/10, 5 Star Rating, IS JUST FUCKING AWESOME!!!!
Simplemente EPICO!!!!!!
现在玩的人虽然不多了，但毕竟是经典

Time and time again, I can always go back and have a good time either by myself or with friends. Understandably frightening and scary for some given the theme and spooky level designs, it is always amusing for me. 

Left 4 Dead established the norm for zombie shooter games and really made something special. It is the kind of game that can leave you with some great memories, especially if you play with friends. I know I still reminice with my friends of some of the great games we played together. A staple game to be part of any PC gamer's collection.
R.I.P. L4D
best game ever
Playing Left 4 Dead is like masturbating. Feels good doing it but later you regret it. And then you keep on doing it
essayez de ne pas trop perdre la vie!

Gioco zombi shooter che anche se è stato rilasciato diversi anni or sono ha una bella grafica che compete e supera molti titoli del giorno d'oggi con comandi di gioco semplici,intuitivi e sopratutto non troppi.I protagonisti sono simpatici e sono una delle cose che ti fa amare di più questo titolo.Le mappe sono tutte accessibili a scelta fin dall'inizio.Tramite console si possono gestire i match e dulcis in fundo è moddabile all'infinito.

Voto: 9/10

Pro
-Bella grafica
-Comandi semplici
-Bei protagonisti
-Moddabile all'infinito
-Match personalizzabili

Contro
-Praticamente nulla

Me sorprende como ya han pasado años desde su lanzamiento y aún teniendo una secuela, este titulo siendo un gran juego que no pierde su esencia, un juego que en todos sus sentidos vale la pena. Juegalo con tus amigos y sobrevive al apocalipsis.

Игра по своему хороша хорошая полу-напряжная атмосфера,  куча зомби,  не самый разнообразный арсенал оружия,. Отсутсвуют интереснные и запоменающиеся локации. В своё время игра стала прорЫром в игровой индустрии. Баги лично не видил. Графон на уровне,  однако лучше взять вторую часть с этими же миссиями. Я её взял в коллекции. В какой-то мере даже зря... Но тогда я об этом не думал.

Where to even begin with this game. To start off, let me just say that, given the choice between playing this and playing Left 4 Dead 2, I'd pick this in a heartbeat. That being said, simply judging this game based on how it compares to the sequel would be pretty unfair of me, so I'll try to judge this game based on it's own merits.

PROS:
-The characers are fun and diverse in personality. There is no other game that I can think of in which a grumpy war veteran, an unhealthily-optimistic businessman, a horror-movie freak of a college student, and an insufferably annoying 'tough guy' biker go toe-to-toe with super-zombie hordes, squealing Naruto fanboys, Gabe Newells, tentacle monsters, crying ladies, and steroids incarnate. The interactions between characters are funny and engaging, and actually make you care about their well-being(something that I have not seen any other online team-based game do).
-The levels are designed wonderfully, taking advantage of dim lighting, a blend of wide-open spaces and narrow corridors, vision-obstructing obstacles(corn fields anyone?), and atmospheric audio cues to provide a legitimate sense of dread and horror.
-You can see your lower body, offering a sense of 'being' and spacial awareness within the game.
-The guns perform well, and the method through with you get them is fun and works to enhance the horror and tension; Survive long enough, you have a higher chance of finding a better gun further along.
-The Witch and the ability to 'cr0wn' her. It's no secret that the Witch can be one-shot, but the tension that comes with attempting to is enough to send chills down the spine of even the most seasoned players.
-Going back to the characters, Valve made each of them more or less the same in terms of how they play. Some might say this makes it weaker in the gameplay and variety department, but to me, it just means you can jump right in and play your favorite character without having to go in with a specific playstyle in mind.

CONS:
-No workshop compatibility. That being said, it's still ridiculously easy to install mods, but it'd be nice if it were even easier.
-The A.I. tends to be kinda garbage. Can't tell you how many times I've been going through No Mercy offline and had the bots shoot the gas station.

BEFORE YOU BUY:
-Left 4 Dead 2 does contain the original maps from this game, so at the very least you can enjoy the level design if you decide to just get that one and save the money.

FINAL SCORE: 7/10
